Parents/Staff,

We received word today, Tuesday, March 17th, that South Dakota schools will not be in session for another week, March 23rd-27th. The state has asked that we work to provide flex, or alternate, education to our students. Our administration and teaching staff are in the process of developing a plan for our district this week. We will have additional information regarding our district plans by the end of this week. This plan will be able to be implemented for the next week or longer if need be. We know that we have many different needs to meet with our students, and we working hard to ensure that we do so. We ask for your patience as we navigate through this.

Brett Mellem, Superintendent
